title: A systematic approach to prioritize diagnostically useful findings for inclusion in electronic health records as discrete data to improve clinical AI tools and genomic …

abstract: The recent widespread use of electronic health records (EHRs) has opened the possibility for innumerable artificial intelligence (AI) tools to aid in genomics, phenomics, and other research, as well as disease prevention, diagnosis, and …
